verses.verse: Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

And <S%H1121>thou<s%>, son of <S%H120>man<s%>, thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%> unto the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, An <S%H7093>end<s%>: the <S%H7093>end<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> upon the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3671>corners<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>.

Now is the <S%H7093>end<s%> upon <S%H7971>thee<s%>, and I will send mine <S%H639>anger<s%> upon <S%H8199>thee<s%>, and will judge thee according to thy <S%H1870>ways<s%>; and I will <S%H5414>bring<s%> upon thee all thine <S%H8441>abominations<s%>.

And mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall not <S%H2347>spare<s%> <S%H2550>thee<s%>, neither will I have pity; but I will <S%H5414>bring<s%> thy <S%H1870>ways<s%> upon <S%H8441>thee<s%>, and thine abominations shall be in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3045>thee<s%>: and ye shall know that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: An <S%H7451>evil<s%>, an <S%H259>only<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%>; <S%H935>behold<s%>, it cometh.
An <S%H7093>end<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%>, the <S%H7093>end<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%>; it <S%H6974>awaketh<s%> against <S%H935>thee<s%>; behold, it cometh.

Thy <S%H6843>doom<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> unto <S%H3427>thee<s%>, O inhabitant of the <S%H776>land<s%>: the <S%H6256>time<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%>, the <S%H3117>day<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%>, a day of <S%H4103>tumult<s%>, and not of joyful <S%H1906>shouting<s%>, upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>.

Now will I <S%H7138>shortly<s%> pour <S%H8210>out<s%> my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> upon <S%H3615>thee<s%>, and accomplish mine <S%H639>anger<s%> against <S%H8199>thee<s%>, and will judge thee according to thy <S%H1870>ways<s%>; and I will <S%H5414>bring<s%> upon thee all thine <S%H8441>abominations<s%>.

And mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall not <S%H2347>spare<s%>, neither will I have <S%H2550>pity<s%>: I will <S%H5414>bring<s%> upon thee according to thy <S%H1870>ways<s%>; and thine <S%H8441>abominations<s%> shall be in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3045>thee<s%>; and ye shall know that <S%H3068>I<s%>, Jehovah, do <S%H5221>smite<s%>.

Behold <S%H3117><s%>, the day, <S%H935>behold<s%>, it cometh: thy <S%H6843>doom<s%> is gone <S%H3318>forth<s%>; the <S%H4294>rod<s%> hath <S%H6692>blossomed<s%>, <S%H2087>pride<s%> hath <S%H6524>budded<s%>.

Violence <S%H2555><s%> is risen <S%H6965>up<s%> into a <S%H4294>rod<s%> of <S%H7562>wickedness<s%>; none of them shall <S%H1995>remain<s%>, nor of their multitude, nor of their <S%H1991>wealth<s%>: neither shall there be eminency among <S%H5089>them<s%>.

The <S%H6256>time<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%>, the <S%H3117>day<s%> draweth <S%H5060>near<s%>: let not the <S%H7069>buyer<s%> <S%H8055>rejoice<s%>, nor the <S%H4376>seller<s%> <S%H56>mourn<s%>; for <S%H2740>wrath<s%> is upon all the multitude <S%H1995>thereof<s%>.

For the <S%H4376>seller<s%> shall not <S%H7725>return<s%> to that which is <S%H4465>sold<s%>, although they be yet <S%H2416>alive<s%>: for the <S%H2377>vision<s%> is touching the whole <S%H1995>multitude<s%> <S%H7725>thereof<s%>, none shall return; neither shall <S%H376>any<s%> <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> himself in the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of his <S%H2416>life<s%>.

They have <S%H8628>blown<s%> the <S%H8619>trumpet<s%>, and have made all <S%H3559>ready<s%>; but none <S%H1980>goeth<s%> to the <S%H4421>battle<s%>; for my <S%H2740>wrath<s%> is upon all the multitude <S%H1995>thereof<s%>.

The <S%H2719>sword<s%> is <S%H2351>without<s%>, and the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> and the <S%H7458>famine<s%> <S%H1004>within<s%>: he that is in the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>: and he that is in the <S%H5892>city<s%>, <S%H7458>famine<s%> and <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> shall devour <S%H398>him<s%>.

But those of them that <S%H6403>escape<s%> shall <S%H6412>escape<s%>, and shall be on the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> like <S%H3123>doves<s%> of the <S%H1516>valleys<s%>, all of them <S%H1993>moaning<s%>, every <S%H376>one<s%> in his <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>.
All <S%H3027>hands<s%> shall be <S%H7503>feeble<s%>, and all <S%H1290>knees<s%> shall be <S%H3212>weak<s%> as <S%H4325>water<s%>.

They shall also <S%H2296>gird<s%> themselves with <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%>, and <S%H6427>horror<s%> shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> <S%H955>them<s%>; and shame shall be upon all <S%H6440>faces<s%>, and <S%H7144>baldness<s%> upon all their <S%H7218>heads<s%>.

They shall <S%H7993>cast<s%> their <S%H3701>silver<s%> in the <S%H2351>streets<s%>, and their <S%H2091>gold<s%> shall be as an <S%H5079>unclean<s%> <S%H3701>thing<s%>; their silver and their <S%H2091>gold<s%> shall not be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> them in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H5678>wrath<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: they shall not <S%H7646>satisfy<s%> their <S%H5315>souls<s%>, neither <S%H4390>fill<s%> their <S%H4578>bowels<s%>; because it hath been the <S%H4383>stumblingblock<s%> of their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>.

As for the <S%H6643>beauty<s%> of his <S%H5716>ornament<s%>, he <S%H7760>set<s%> it in <S%H1347>majesty<s%>; but they <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H6754>images<s%> of their <S%H8441>abominations<s%> and their detestable <S%H8251>things<s%> <S%H5414>therein<s%>: therefore have I made it unto them as an unclean <S%H5079>thing<s%>.

And I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H2114>strangers<s%> for a <S%H957>prey<s%>, and to the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> for a <S%H7998>spoil<s%>; and they shall profane <S%H2490>it<s%>.

My <S%H6440>face<s%> will I <S%H5437>turn<s%> also from <S%H2490>them<s%>, and they shall profane my <S%H6845>secret<s%> <S%H6530>place<s%>; and robbers shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into <S%H2490>it<s%>, and profane it.

Make <S%H6213><s%> the <S%H7569>chain<s%>; for the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H4941>crimes<s%>, and the <S%H5892>city<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H2555>violence<s%>.

Wherefore I will <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H7451>worst<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and they shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> their <S%H1004>houses<s%>: I will also make the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of the <S%H5794>strong<s%> to <S%H7673>cease<s%>; and their holy <S%H6942>places<s%> shall be <S%H2490>profaned<s%>.
Destruction <S%H7089><s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%>; and they shall <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%>, and there shall be none.

Mischief <S%H1943><s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> upon <S%H1943>mischief<s%>, and <S%H8052>rumor<s%> shall be upon <S%H8052>rumor<s%>; and they shall <S%H1245>seek<s%> a <S%H2377>vision<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>; but the <S%H8451>law<s%> shall <S%H6>perish<s%> from the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and <S%H6098>counsel<s%> from the <S%H2205>elders<s%>.

The <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H56>mourn<s%>, and the <S%H5387>prince<s%> shall be <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H8077>desolation<s%>, and the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H926>troubled<s%>: I will <S%H6213>do<s%> unto them after their <S%H1870>way<s%>, and according to their <S%H4941>deserts<s%> will I <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H3045>them<s%>; and they shall know that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
